code:
# @param {String} s1
# @param {String} s2
# @param {Integer} x
# @return {Integer}
def min_operations(s1, s2, x)
    diffs = []
    n = s1.length
    cost = 0

    # Identify positions where s1 and s2 differ
    n.times do |i|
        diffs << i if s1[i] != s2[i]
    end

    # If the number of differences is odd, it's impossible to make the strings equal
    return -1 if diffs.size.odd?

    i = 0
    while i < diffs.size
        # If adjacent positions differ, prefer to flip them with cost 1
        if i < diffs.size - 1 && diffs[i + 1] == diffs[i] + 1
            cost += 1
            i += 2
        else
            # Otherwise, flip a pair with the given cost x
            cost += x
            i += 2
        end
    end

    cost
end
